Question:
If we are going early in the morning towards the south the sun will be visible at our left:

A. Always
B. Never
C. Often
D. Sometimes
Solution:
Early in the morning the sun is in the direction of east. If we are going towards the south, our face will be in the direction of South and our left hand will be in the direction of east.
Hence if we go early in the morning towards the south the sun will always be visible at our left.
